item.title: Uvicorn ANSI Color Error In Pycharm Terminal
item.description: Origin Recently I’m learning FastAPI wanting to develop a JSON API based backend server which using Uvicorn as ASGI server. Previously I usually used VSCode to writing python script, but this time I’d like to build a slightly bigger project so I turned to Pycharm to build FastAPI application. Uvicorn Uvicorn is a lightning-fast ASGI server implementation, using uvloop and httptools. ERROR When I ran FastAPI application with uvicorn.exe sql_app.main:app I got into a weird trouble:
